Class DatabaseTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseTester

  • public class DatabaseTester
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseTester() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteStudent(java.lang.String stuID)
      Method to test the database operation to delete an individual student from the database. A StudentDAO object is created before the method to delete a Student, as defined in the StudentDAO class, is called, with the result being printed to the console.
      static void getAllStudents()
      Method to test the database operation to retrieve all the Students from the database and return the result as JSON output. A StudentDAO and a Gson object is created before the method to retrieve all the students is called, with the result being stored in an ArrayList of Student objects.
      static void insertStudent(Student stu)
      Method to test the database operation to insert a student into the Student database. A StudentDAO object is created before the method to insert a Student, as defined in the StudentDAO class, is called, with the result being printed to the console.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method runs all CRUD functionality tests Note: you will need access to the source code to ensure that an SQL Error is not thrown when inserting or deleting a student from the database. Two Students are created for the purpose of testing the methods to insert and updating a Student in the Student Database
      static void updateStudent(Student stu)
      Method to test the database operation to update an individual student in the database. A StudentDAO object is created before the method to update a Student, as defined in the StudentDAO class, is called, with the result being printed to the console.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseTester

        public DatabaseTester()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method runs all CRUD functionality tests Note: you will need access to the source code to ensure that an SQL Error is not thrown when inserting or deleting a student from the database. Two Students are created for the purpose of testing the methods to insert and updating a Student in the Student Database
        Parameters:
        args - takes in console arguments as is defined of a main method

      • insertStudent

        public static void insertStudent(Student stu)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to test the database operation to insert a student into the Student database. A StudentDAO object is created before the method to insert a Student, as defined in the StudentDAO class, is called, with the result being printed to the console.
        Parameters:
        stu - the Student object being inserted into the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllStudents

        public static void getAllStudents()
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to test the database operation to retrieve all the Students from the database and return the result as JSON output. A StudentDAO and a Gson object is created before the method to retrieve all the students is called, with the result being stored in an ArrayList of Student objects. The Gson object is then used to convert the ArrayList to a JSON object. Note: The Gson library is an external library so will have to be downloaded and then added to the src folder.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateStudent

        public static void updateStudent(Student stu)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to test the database operation to update an individual student in the database. A StudentDAO object is created before the method to update a Student, as defined in the StudentDAO class, is called, with the result being printed to the console.
        Parameters:
        stu - the Student object being updated in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteStudent

        public static void deleteStudent(java.lang.String stuID)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to test the database operation to delete an individual student from the database. A StudentDAO object is created before the method to delete a Student, as defined in the StudentDAO class, is called, with the result being printed to the console.
        Parameters:
        stuID - the Student Number/ID of the student being deleted from the Student Database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
